column5: The national Highway Safety Council has done extensive testing on a newly designed seat belt. Results show that accidents can be reduced by as much as 45% when the belt is properly installed.  Correct installation is illustrated below...  This is very Important, please pass on to friends and family.
Could also save a marriage or two.  FLEX
lol its funny, my wife thought it was funny too  cheers!
Why didnt I open this sooner. I put it on mr screen saver for when the mrs,s gets home. Problem is, I,ll be sleeping when she see,s it. THANKS
I don't think you'll be sleeping for long after that.
